nodes.text: This singing competition aired on holotelevision. Once, when Jedi Grand Master Yoda was making a holographic transmission to the Jedi High Council, a young Han Solo ("Ian") got bored and briefly interrupted the transmission with a series of holotevision programs, one of which was this singing competition. Bib Fortuna sang on the program and viewers were encouraged to vote for him by calling 1900-555-FORTUNA.
